ing: 1/2 cup cold water, or more as needed
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
des: "The ginger, lime, and lemon add flavor. Apples add sweetness. Surprisingly delicious! Adjust the amount of water to the consistency you like. Make a thicker drink to replace breakfast."
ins: Place cucumber, apples, celery, water, spinach, parsley, ginger, lime juice, and lemon juice in a blender; blend until smooth.
